import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import Carousel from 'react-elastic-carousel'; import imageClosing from '../images/nagy-arnold-X_IvVDuHvDQ-unsplash.jpg'; import quotesClosing from '../images/”.png'; import imageTemoignage from '../images/karina-vargas-J7hCnavj7QE-unsplash.jpg'; function ClosingAcademie() { const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); const [articles, setArticles] = useState(null); const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log('submit'); } const handleChange = (event) => { console.log(event.currentTarget); } useEffect(() => { GetArticlesClosingAcademie(); },[]) function GetArticlesClosingAcademie() { axios.get('http://localhost:1337/api/articles-academies') .then((response) => { setArticles(response.data.data) setIsLoading(false) console.log(response.data.data[0].attributes.title) }) .catch(error => { console.log(error) }) } return (
